description:
Kazenbo, the giant specter of fire symbolizing the burning wrath of the Kurozumi Clan, rampages through the castle creating panic among both the Animal Kingdom Pirates and the samurai. Orochi who is watching in excitement suddenly hears a sound that brings back memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Angriff des Kazenbos – Orochis teuflische Fänge kommen näher
Kazenbou Shuurai: Semaru Orochi no Ma no Te
Moine enflammé en approche. Le piège d`Orochi se referme !
The Onslaught of Kazenbo - Orochi`s Evil Clutches Close In
¡La batalla se intensifica! ¡Los aliados contra los Piratas Bestia!
هجوم كازينبو الكارثيّ! براثن أوروتشي الشّرّيرة تقترب!
火前坊襲来 迫るオロチの魔の手
